```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
admissions_agesex <- read_csv("clean_data/clean_admissions_agesex.csv")
```


```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  filter(hbqf == "d")
```

```{r}
colnames(admissions_agesex)
```

```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  filter(age_group == "All ages",
         hb_name == "Scotland",
        # sex == "All",
         admission_type == "All") %>%
  ggplot(aes(week_ending, percent_variation)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~sex)
```
```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  filter(#age_group == "All ages",
         hb_name == "Scotland",
         sex == "All",
         admission_type == "All") %>%
  ggplot(aes(week_ending, percent_variation)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~age_group)
```

```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  filter(age_group == "All ages",
         hb_name == "Scotland",
         sex == "All") %>%
  # select(week_ending, percent_variation) %>%
  arrange(week_ending)
```



```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland",
         age_group != "All ages") %>%
  ggplot(aes(week_ending, percent_variation)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~age_group)
```

```{r}
admissions_agesex %>%
  group_by(admission_type_qf) %>%
  summarise(count = n())
```
